channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 消息人士称，越南国会将于周四召开特别会议，讨论 "人事问题"，其中可能包括总统武文忠可能辞职的问题
item.description:
Vietnam’s parliament is set to hold a special session on Thursday to discuss “personnel matters” that may include the possible resignation of President Vo Van Thuong, sources say https://t.co/APQcbTU2v7

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 去年，香港有 2700 多家单一家族办公室进驻香港，这得益于政府推动加强香港作为亚洲财富中心的地位。
item.description:
Hong Kong had more than 2,700 single-family offices based in the city last year, following the government’s push to bolster its status as an Asian wealth hub https://t.co/YhLOJF7Zwb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 在今年上涨近 25% 之后，债券经理们正在减少对巴基斯坦债务的投资，因为该国历史上的政策失误给国际货币基金组织（IMF）新救助计划的谈判蒙上了一层阴影。
item.description:
Bond managers are reducing their exposure to Pakistan’s debt after a rally of almost 25% this year, as the nation’s history of policy slippage cast a cloud over negotiations for a new IMF bailout program https://t.co/ybtQTJIMfk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 大宗商品交易行业在利润方面取得了有史以来第二好的成绩，银行存款超过 1 000 亿美元，积累了大量现金用于资产投资和开拓新市场。
item.description:
The commodity trading industry reaped its second-best year ever in terms of profits, banking over $100 billion and building up a mountain of cash to spend on assets and breaking into new markets. https://t.co/71Dy3S8vTA

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 从 2026 年起，澳大利亚的新父母将有权享受政府资助的六个月育儿假，比目前的水平增加六周。
item.description:
New parents in Australia will be entitled to six months of government-funded parental leave from 2026, up six weeks from current levels. https://t.co/rpBGY3it81

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 迪拜统治者的侄子谢赫阿里-阿勒马克图姆将在香港开设家族办公室
item.description:
Sheikh Ali Al Maktoum, the nephew of Dubai's ruler, is opening a family office in Hong Kong https://t.co/xW3pDOF6cm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 据台湾自治岛屿的安全官员称，中国似乎正在减少对台湾的军事压力，他们警告说，北京仍有可能继续开展外交孤立运动
item.description:
China seems to be toning down its military pressure on Taiwan, according to security officials from the self-governed island, who warned Beijing will still likely continue its diplomatic isolation campaign https://t.co/SNFReLDqS1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 苹果、Meta、亚马逊、谷歌和 Bytedance 代表本周在布鲁塞尔参加欧盟会谈。阅读布鲁塞尔版
item.description:
Apple, Meta, Amazon, Google and Bytedance representatives land in Brussels this week for EU talks. Read the Brussels Edition https://t.co/iAL74DlXsR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 独家：苹果公司正在洽谈在 iPhone 中内置谷歌 Gemini 人工智能引擎的潜在大宗交易。
item.description:
EXCLUSIVE: Apple is in talks to build Google’s Gemini AI engine into the iPhone in a potential blockbuster deal.

Here's what we know so far https://t.co/XyJX9BY5Qg pic.twitter.com/Jv4UfHuMM8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 随着股市屡创新高和比特币反弹，最受欢迎的劳力士和百达翡丽二手手表的价格下滑可能即将结束。
item.description:
The slump in prices for the most popular second-hand Rolex and Patek Philippe watches may be nearing an end as stock markets hit records and Bitcoin rebounds https://t.co/Fh5ZQmQ0VX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 彭博社调查显示，德国正处于经济衰退之中，今年经济几乎不会增长
item.description:
Germany is in recession and its economy will hardly grow this year, according to a Bloomberg survey https://t.co/kn3lA0eDJb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 指导英国央行决定何时降低英国利率的七张图表
item.description:
Seven charts that will guide the Bank of England's decision on when to reduce UK interest rates https://t.co/wEEE90p3u7

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: @johnauthers 说，日本央行加息将挤压利差交易商，但会给中国带来回旋余地。然后是美联储
item.description:
A Bank of Japan rate hike would squeeze carry traders, but give China room to maneuver, says @johnauthers. Then comes the Fed https://t.co/5abb63VSPs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 一家伦敦基金成为 FTX 下跌的最大赢家之一，但有一笔交易遇到了瓶颈
item.description:
A London fund emerged as one of biggest winners of FTX’s downfall, but one deal has hit a speed bump https://t.co/Ophy3vns4K

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 中国动力煤产量多年来首次下降
item.description:
China’s output of thermal coal has fallen for the first time in years https://t.co/1NbbOSZB9T

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 由于炼油厂加紧运营以满足假期需求，中国年初的原油加工量创下历史新高
item.description:
China processed a record amount of crude at the start of the year as refiners ramped up operations to meet holiday demand https://t.co/DFb8SObhKb

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 日本一家主要货币市场经纪公司的员工正准备迎接 17 年来从未发生过的事情：央行基准短期利率上调
item.description:
Staff at one of Japan’s major money-market brokerages are getting ready for something that hasn’t happened for 17 years: an increase in the central bank’s benchmark short-term interest rate https://t.co/EZDtUgghdT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 波音公司 2024 年灾难性的开局正在波及航空公司。对乘客来说，这意味着航班选择减少，至少一些热门航线的价格可能会上涨。看看哪些航线和航空公司可能会受到影响
item.description:
Boeing’s disastrous start to 2024 is spilling over to airlines.

For passengers, this will mean fewer flight options and potentially higher prices on at least some popular routes. See which routes and airlines are among the ones that may be impacted https://t.co/RAIyTVGlbf

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 有消息称，美国检察官扩大了对阿达尼集团的调查范围，重点调查其是否参与了贿赂行为，阿达尼集团的几种美元债券创下了半年多来的最大跌幅。
item.description:
Several of Adani Group’s dollar bonds fall the most in more than half a year, after news that US prosecutors have widened their probe of the port-to-power conglomerate to focus on whether it may have engaged in bribery https://t.co/6FwfKkKsXF

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 荣华健康的一些债权人说服纽约州法院，他们有资格起诉这家中国房地产开发商未支付债券款项
item.description:
Some creditors of Glory Health convinced a New York state court that they have standing to sue the Chinese property developer for missing payments on its bond https://t.co/7fbXM6VST4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 目前，日本正受到投资者的追捧。这里有一些须知：
item.description:
Japan is all the rage for investors right now. Here's what to know: https://t.co/rk7gcaDar6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）表示，俄罗斯不会被阻止实现自己的目标，因为他在总统大选中取得了创纪录的胜利，而选举结果是预先确定的。
item.description:
Vladimir Putin says Russia won’t be stopped from pursuing its goals after he sweeps to a record victory in a presidential election whose outcome was pre-determined https://t.co/PFnnyPGpr5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）表示，俄罗斯不会被阻止实现自己的目标，因为他在总统大选中取得了创纪录的胜利，而选举结果是预先确定的。
item.description:
Vladimir Putin says Russia won’t be stopped from pursuing its goals after he sweeps to a record victory in a presidential election whose outcome was pre-determined https://t.co/4Ur72GfXpR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 从上周末的交易情况来看，香港的房屋销售反弹势头开始减弱
item.description:
Hong Kong’s home sales rebound is beginning to lose steam, if last weekend’s transactions are any guide https://t.co/KZN3Jl7WKa

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 以下是本周全球商品市场值得关注的五张图表

item.title: 今年年初，中国工厂产出和投资的增长比预期更为强劲，这是世界第二大经济体获得牵引力的最新证据
item.description:
China’s factory output and investment grew more strongly than expected at the start of the year, the latest evidence the world’s second-largest economy gained traction https://t.co/E12sIg9frV

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 随着新系统提高交易能力，以及低借贷成本推动散户投资激增，越南券商股的涨势可能会延续下去
item.description:
A rally in Vietnamese brokerage stocks is likely to extend as a new system increases trading capacity and low borrowing costs fuel an upsurge in retail investing https://t.co/ACEftWqeXy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 新一轮停电加剧了资金紧张的古巴岛国的紧张局势，抗议者走上街头，爆发了罕见的社会动荡。
item.description:
Protesters take to the streets of Cuba in a rare outburst of social unrest as a fresh wave of blackouts exacerbates tensions on the cash-strapped island https://t.co/iFAiEyeHB8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 马来西亚林吉特是本月表现最佳的新兴亚洲货币之一，为投资者购买该国债券提供了另一个理由
item.description:
Malaysia’s ringgit has been one of emerging Asia’s best performer this month, giving investors another reason to buy the nation’s bonds https://t.co/OBaXVUvenS

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024

item.title: 英国政府将从下月起全额资助 21 岁以下人员在小型企业中接受学徒培训
item.description:
The UK government is set to fully fund apprenticeships in small businesses for people under 21 years old starting next month https://t.co/ILnzWz4zr9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 18, 2024
